Summary: Saw Strange Glowing Pulsated Lights in Space
divs: Sighting Detailsi just Saw Strange Glowing Pulsated Lights in Space when i was looking at the stars, they were changing direction fast, from left to right and up and down, i call my wife and everyone in my moms house to look at the lights or orbs in space and the lights were flying fast up and down then stop and moved from left to right in fast speeds, my parents that are Christians and non believer in life in space they just say they are NASA satellites or the Hubble space telescope, but i know NASA Satellites can move in that speeds and change directions sow quick in high speeds... they Strange Orbs were doing that for 5 minutes or more and in a Flash left to space and everyone was amazed in what happened the lights or orbs just despairing in a flash, and second later a Army Helicopter was looking with a Spot lights at us and everyone in the neighborhood then they left to the mountains to look around then left after 10 minutes later.
